Class BufferUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.servicetalk.buffer.netty.BufferUtils

extends java.lang.Object
    Internal utilities for Buffers.

public static io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf toByteBufNoThrow​(Buffer buffer)

        Returns:
